Name: Grandfather's Heirlooms
Author: rikai
Description: A continuation of the Grandfather's Gift Remade

Meta:Changelog.1.2.0: Fix un-pickup-able chest; add option to have weapon not added immediately to chest
Meta:Changelog.1.2.1: Fix crash due to too-early Dispose()
Meta:Changelog.1.2.4: Change weapon log to Info level; suppress warning of unused const
Meta:Changelog.1.2.5: Revert skipping mod after triggered once because state is game-wide instead of per-save
Meta:Changelog.2.0.0: Set positioning based on marriage state, code cleanup/modernization, more detailed logging, rename project, update copyright, GUID & description
Meta:Changelog.2.0.1: Fix an issue with EntryDLL naming.
Meta:Changelog.2.0.2: Made console output a bit less spammy by moving Debug and Info level logs to Trace.
Meta:Changelog.2.2.1: Fix an issue where the correct stats were not being used for the weapon.
